ascend_skill.desc: When using a skill, gain Beat stacks. When Beat stacks reach 4 or more, Resonance activates, spending 4 Beat stacks to grant 1 Pulsating Rhythm stack to the party. When allies have Pulsating Rhythm, increase Attack by 10%/15%/20%, Defense by 10%/15%/20% and ailment accuracy by 5%/7.5%/10% based on Tomiyama's level (effect increases at level 1/50/70). Lasts for 2 turns. Stacks up to 3 times, and effects increase based on number of stacks.
ascend_skill.name: Fever Time

ascend_skill.desc: At the start of battle, gain 2 Beat stacks, and increase party's ailment accuracy by 35% for 1 turn.
ascend_skill.name: Finish with a Smile

ascend_skill.desc: After granting Pulsating Rhythm, 20% chance to gain 1 Beat stack.
ascend_skill.name: Disco Ball

ascend_skill.desc: Increase the skill levels of Club Okyann and Intermission by 2.
ascend_skill.name: Pop and Show It

ascend_skill.desc: When an ally uses a Highlight, 67% chance to gain 1 Beat stack.
ascend_skill.name: Queen of the Stage

ascend_skill.desc: Increase the skill level of Retro Dance Number by 2.
ascend_skill.name: Raise the Roof

ascend_skill.desc:
After activating Pulsating Rhythm, 25% chance to activate Encore, granting 1 additional Pulsating Rhythm.
Encore will not activate consecutively.
ascend_skill.name: Hey, DJ!

normal_skill.desc:
Increase party's Attack by 12% of Tomiyama's Attack for 1 turn (up to 4500/4950/5400/5850 of Attack), increase ailment accuracy by 35.0%/38.5%/37.8%/41.3%, and gain 1 Beat stack.
Cooldown Time: 4 ally actions.
normal_skill.name: Club Okyann

normal_skill.desc:
Restore party's SP by 22/27/26/31, and grant 3 Beat stacks.
Cooldown Time: 8 ally actions.
normal_skill.name: Intermission

normal_skill.desc:
Increase party's damage by 10.0%/11.0%/10.8%/11.8% for 3 turns. Increase damage by 1% for every 225 of Tomiyama's Attack (up to 4500/4950/5400/5850 of Attack).
Also increase damage dealt to foes with an elemental ailment by 1.5 times and gain 2 Beat stacks.
Cooldown Time: 8 ally actions.
normal_skill.name: Retro Dance Number

passive_skill.desc: For every 4 Beat stacks gained, inflict 1 random elemental ailment on the foe with the highest remaining HP.
passive_skill.name: Toe-Tapping

passive_skill.desc: When an ally inflicts an elemental ailment on a foe, increase that ally's damage by 15% for 2 turns. Also, 21% chance to grant 1 Beat stack.
passive_skill.name: Outdated Slang
